subject: [cc-devel] XMP Toolkit 4.1.1 from Adobe -- BSD!!!!
body:
Notice this: http://www.adobe.com/devnet/xmp/sdk/eula.html

Build the future up! I'm following up to find out more from PM from
Adobe on this...

It hasn't been announced yet, but wanted to let you all in on it!
